# AI & Digital Transformation Consultant

> 20+ years technologist specializing in AI integration, Retool development, and digital transformation for startups and SMBs. Founder of EloquentOps.com (Retool Agency Partner) and DeckServe.com.

## About

Experienced technology consultant helping companies navigate AI adoption and digital transformation. Expertise in rapid prototyping, system integration, and building scalable internal tools using Retool as a central digital hub.

## Services

**Advisory Tier (€1,000/month)**
Strategic guidance for startups and early-stage teams who need technical and strategic direction but can execute internally. Includes weekly strategic calls, architecture decisions, and best practices recommendations.

**Partnership Tier (€3,000/month)**
Strategic plus operational execution for SMBs pushing digitalization and AI. Includes weekly planning calls, hands-on implementation, continuous iteration, AI integration, and automation.

## Core Expertise

- AI Integration & Strategy: Guiding companies through practical AI adoption, focusing on value delivery before complexity
- Retool Development: Official Retool Agency Partner, specializing in building unified digital hubs that connect data, services, automations, and AI agents
- Digital Transformation: Helping businesses move from disconnected systems to integrated, automated workflows
- Technical Architecture: Designing scalable, evolutionary systems that grow with business needs
- Rapid Implementation: Weekly iterations with immediate, measurable results

## Technology Stack

- Retool for unified digital hubs and internal tools
- AI agents and LLM integration
- API integrations (CRM, ERP, databases)
- Automation workflows
- Cloud-first with on-premises options when needed

## Philosophy

**Experiment First, Secure Later**: Start small, prove value, then move to privacy and compliance. Don't put the cart before the horse by over-engineering security before validating the solution brings actual value.

**Speed and Iteration**: Rapid implementation with weekly iterations. Zero wasted time. Continuous innovation.

**Fixed Pricing**: Transparent monthly fees with no surprises, controlled budgets, and measurable ROI.

## Projects

- EloquentOps.com: Boutique consultancy specialized in Retool development (official Retool Agency Partner)
- DeckServe.com: Automated PDF generation tool for presentations and documents

## Content Areas

This site includes blog posts and articles covering:
- AI adoption strategies for SMBs
- Retool development best practices
- Digital transformation case studies
- Low-code/no-code platform insights
- System integration patterns
- Automation workflows

## Key Pages

- Homepage: Introduction to services and approach
- Blog: Technical articles and insights on AI, Retool, and digital transformation
- Projects: Portfolio showcasing client work and personal projects
- About: Background and experience details
- Pricing: Detailed service tiers and engagement models

## Background

20+ years of hands-on technology experience blending deep technical skills with strategic insight. Previous role as Co-Founder & CTO at TODO.TO.IT. Currently advising startups and growth-stage teams on AI integration and digital transformation.
